name: KeQing
title: Driving Thunder
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue - but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

normalattack.name: Yunlai Sword
normalattack.description: Performs up to five rapid strikes. When charged, unleashes two rapid strikes.

elementalskill.name: Stellar Restoration
elementalskill.description: Throws a Lightning Stiletto at opponents and deals Electro DMG in small AoE. When held, she can adjust where the stilettos are thrown. She can also suspend them in the air and jump to them using Stellar Restoration.

elementalburst.name: Starward Sword
elementalburst.description: Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AoE. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Land's Overseer
passivetalent1.description: When dispatched to Liyue, the time taken to complete the task decreases by 25%.

passivetalent2.name: Thundering Penance
passivetalent2.description: If a Lightning Stiletto is present and Keqing recasts Stellar Restoration, her Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Electro DMG.

passivetalent3.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passivetalent3.description: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate and Energy Recharge increases by 15% for 8s.

constellations.d1: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.
constellations.d2: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attack's hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: When initiating a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
